name: Robot Run (or not)
description:
Random robot game with no story. Go through each level. The movement has a slight learning curve, so don't expect to be good at the game from the start. Sorry if it's a little laggy, I already optimized the game and it's still really slow. This is intended to be a rage game, so don’t expect to beat it unless you put in some work. All the levels are possible and have been playtested.

edit: I only encountered the lag on opera gx, so if you face it too, try switching to another browser temporarily, it might fix the lag issue.

FULLSCREEN PLEASE
